description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. My name is Jessica and I am 8 years old. I don't remeber what happened but when I opened up my eyes I was in this cold and dark place. Where the hell am I? There's no one here? Help me!  Guide Jessica though a creepy world with the only help of a smart phone. Overcome your fears and experience a breathtaking adventure.
description.short: My name is Jessica and I am 8 years old. I don't remeber what happened but when I opened up my eyes I was in this cold and dark place. Where the hell am I? There's no one here? Help me!  Guide Jessica though a creepy world with the only help of a smart phone. Overcome your fears and experience a breathtaking adventure.
